thread.section_title: Bes'Dam Soup Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bes'Dam Soup | besdamsoup.com
thread.title: Patricia Wichman
thread.title_full: Bes'Dam Soup reviewed by Patricia Wichman

author: Patricia Wichman
title: Patricia Wichman
text:
First order took a while to arrive due to unexpected number of orders after an appearance on Fox and Friends but so worth it. Ordered again and product was on my porch within 36 hours.
Shared the Tuscan white bean with friends who were all sick with flu and they raved.
Good company.
